item.title: OpenShift3: Enabling Modern TLS Ciphers
item.description: ENABLING MODERN TLS & CIPHERS ON ROUTER & MASTER 1. INTRODUCTION During VA scan, some cipher considered as not safe and need to be disabled. There are two places that we need to configure: Master Router 2. CONFIGURATION STEPS MASTER. On all master nodes: Edit /etc/origin/master/master-origin.yaml ... minTLSVersion: VersionTLS12 cipherSuites: - TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256 - TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_256_CBC_SHA - TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA Restart master components. ROUTER. There are several built-in router cipher suite [1]
